name: Twisted Reality (Marcolbx, Guajava, Ofo978, Wendy_Sketches, Tacos2x1, RamiroVargas-Dev)
name_original: Twisted Reality (Marcolbx, Guajava, Ofo978, Wendy_Sketches, Tacos2x1, RamiroVargas-Dev)
description:
FIRST PRESS "NEW GAME"

CONTROLS

X to Jump,  HOLD X to Wall Jump 

Space to Attack

Left & Right Key to Move. 

Down Key to change weapon. 

And most importantly: Enjoy the game!!

If you get any errors, click *load game* .

Created By:

  2. Wendy Orrillo - Wendy_Sketches
  3. Juan Andrés Pérez - Tacos2x1
